sentences.en: A systemic anaphylaxis has also been described.
sentences.cn: 全身的过敏性也曾有报道.

sentences.en: A systemic examination is necessary in evaluating the state of the heart.
sentences.cn: 在判定心脏状况时,需要作全身检查.

sentences.en: Alternate use of systemic and protectant fungicides may delay the onset of resistance.
sentences.cn: 内吸性杀菌剂与保护性杀菌剂交替使用可以延缓抗药性的出现.

sentences.en: As preventive, spray plants with systemic insecticide or fumigate them regularly.
sentences.cn: 作为预防措施, 要用内吸杀虫剂对植物定期喷洒,或熏蒸.

sentences.en: Changes in the retinal arteries reflect the severity of systemic hypertensive disease.
sentences.cn: 视网膜动脉的变化是全身高血压病严重性的反映.

sentences.en: Many systemic side effects, including skin and appendages, have been reported.
sentences.cn: 包括皮肤及其附属器, 许多系统的副作用都曾被报告.

sentences.en: Measures which minimize systemic uptake reduce toxicity.
sentences.cn: 凡是足以减少周身吸收的方法,都能减少毒性反应.

sentences.en: Register theory is one of the important theories in systemic - functional grammar.
sentences.cn: 该理论是系统功能语法的重要理论之一.

sentences.en: Systemic insecticides have shown particular promise.
sentences.cn: 内吸杀虫剂看来特别有效.

sentences.en: Systemic use of the anti - muscarinic agents can also precipitate glaucoma in such predisposed patients.
sentences.cn: 对于有这种发病倾向的患者,全身性应用抗毒蕈碱类药物也能诱发青光眼.

sentences.en: The economy is locked in a systemic crisis.
The Fed must be put in charge of regulating systemic risk.
sentences.cn: 必须让美联储负责监管系统性风险.

sentences.en: The rest of the systemic venous return is diverted into the right horn of the sinus.
sentences.cn: 其余的体静脉回流转到静脉窦右角.

sentences.en: Valvular heart disease, usually aortic and mitral insufficiency, can complicate a variety of systemic diseases.
sentences.cn: 瓣膜性心脏病, 以主动脉瓣及二尖瓣闭锁不全为最常见, 可使各种全身性疾病变得复杂.

sentences.en: When people about lupus, they usually the systemic the disease.
sentences.cn: 当人们在谈论红斑时, 他们通常是指系统性疾病.

words.tran_cn: 系统的；体系的；有系统的；[图情] 分类的
组织化；系统化；制度化；组织主义
分类者；组织者；使体系化的人
系统化，体系化（systematize的过去式）
使系统化；使有秩序（等于systematize）
使系统化；使组织化；将…分类
使……系统化；把……分类；组织化

phrases.tran_cn: 系统性风险；系统（连锁反映的）风险
系统性硬化，系统性硬化病；全身性硬化症；系统性硬皮病

trans.tran_cn: 系统的，[生]全身的，体系的
